item.title: Covad Ethernet Now Cheaper Than T1
item.description:
Prepare to be surprised! Covad is now offering Ethernet bandwidth at prices even lower than T1 solutions of comparable speeds. That’s right, the tide has turned, and Ethernet is now a more budget-friendly option. While this is an initial launch in 12 markets across California, Michigan, Minnesota, Pennsylvania, and Texas, it could be a sign of a nationwide shift in telecommunication pricing. To see if your location qualifies, you can check Ethernet availability online...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/covad-ethernet-now-cheaper-than-t1/
